header.tagline: Senior Estimator & Quantity Surveyor - Infrastructure & Civil Works

summary: 15+ years in civil and infrastructure estimating, excelling in cost control with 28% under-budget results.

bullets.text: Led the comprehensive analysis of tender documents, ensuring accurate cost forecasts and securing 15 project bids, resulting in a 32% increase in closed contracts.
Developed detailed Bill of Quantities (BOQ) and tender documents, which improved bid accuracy by 25% and reduced project overruns.
Achieved 28% under-budget results by conducting precise quantity take-offs for civil projects, covering foundations to waterproofing.
Managed cost estimating and consulting, acquiring competitive quotes that reduced supplier expenses by 18%.
Successfully assessed design variation costs, minimizing financial impact of changes by 22%.
Streamlined project development processes, maintaining budget adherence in all phases with a 95% precision rate.
Implemented budget adjustments through rigorous follow-up, improving financial efficiency by 21%.
Led scope analysis for large-scale infrastructure projects, contributing to tender submissions that won $33.3M+ in contracts.
Executed detailed quantity take-offs and developed BOQ for projects such as South Morang Terminal Station, ensuring accurate scope understanding.
Oversaw cost estimation and negotiation with suppliers, resulting in a 29% reduction in material costs across multiple projects.
Managed tender package analysis, identifying and mitigating potential cost overruns, keeping to a 90% accuracy in forecasts.
Collaborated with contractors to clarify scope, enhancing project delivery timelines by 35% through improved methods.
Ensured project compliance through detailed program schedules, reducing project timeline overruns by 17%.
Led the finalization of detailed BOQ post construction, aiding projects to achieve a 100% acceptance rate by clients.
Directed tender document analysis and scope determination for projects, achieving an 85% success rate in proposal acceptance.
Utilized BOQs and commercial proposals to secure deals, improving pricing accuracy, thus increasing bid wins by 40%.
Coordinated with site and management teams to ensure that awarded project details were thoroughly communicated and available for reference.
Handled cost request negotiations, achieving greater supplier terms, reducing expenses by 24% through strategic discussions.
Crafted the design follow-up plan for BOQs that standardized cost estimating across five high-value developments.
Facilitated resolution procedures for client disputes, achieving 100% positive outcomes in contract negotiations and amendments.

education.additionalInfo: Member of Brazilian Council of Architecture and Urbanism
Specialized online course for professional development

additionalExperience: Specialized in estimating and surveying for high-rise residential and multi-purpose infrastructure projects, contributing significantly to budget management processes and cost efficiency.
